alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 20 at 3:16PM MDT until March 21 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING TO 3 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected along I-15 between Pintura and Leads. * WHERE...Lower Washington County including the cities of St. George and Hurricane. The strongest winds are expected to be between Pintura and Leads along I-15. * WHEN...From 6 PM MDT this evening to 3 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust will be possible along I-15 where recently tilled soils can easily be disturbed. Visibilities can quickly reduce and driving visibility will become extremely poor in these conditions.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
